      while (WR_bit) do begin end;

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;

      EEPROM_Write(EE_ConfirmOperaMenuEeAddr, 1);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end;

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;

      EEPROM_Write(EE_ConfirmTempMenuEeAddr, 1);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end;

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_PasswordEeAddr, 1234); // şifre default olarak 1234 atandı
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
      
      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U1VoltRefValuEeAddr, 230);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
      
      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U2VoltRefValuEeAddr, 230);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U3VoltRefValuEeAddr, 230);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U1AmpsRefValuEeAddr, 0);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U2AmpsRefValuEeAddr, 0);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      EEPROM_Write(EE_U3AmpsRefValuEeAddr, 0);
      while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

      Pause_Ms(50);
      asm ClrWDT; end;

      

 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure Measurement_Screen;
var Red_Volt_Temp : word;
 begin

      if (ChargeStatus = Discharge) then
        begin
             ValueDivide(Read_BattAmps, 255);
             Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 24, Row5, Black);
             Glcd_Write_Char('-',18,row5,Black);
             
             BattAmpsLimitBit                    := 0; // akü akım sınırlama, deşarj durumunda kontrol edilmeyecek
             Led1_Group.Led1_BattAmpLimit        := 0;
             Relay_Out_Data.RlyOut_14_BattMCB    := 0;
             Rly_BattMcbBit                      := 0;
             
        end else
      if (ChargeStatus = Charge) then
        begin
             ValueDivide(Read_BattAmps, 255);
             Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 24, Row5, Black);
             Glcd_Write_Char(' ',18,row5,Black);
             if (Read_BattAmps >= (BatteryAmpsSet*0.993)) then // akü akım sınırlama
               begin
                    BattAmpsLimitBit                    := 1;
                    Led1_Group.Led1_BattAmpLimit        := 1;
                    Relay_Out_Data.RlyOut_7_BattAmpLimit      := 1;
                    Rly_BattAmpsLimitBit                      := 1;
               end else
             if (Read_BattAmps < (BatteryAmpsSet*0.992)) then
               begin
                    BattAmpsLimitBit                    := 0;
                    LogBit_Blimit                       := 0;
                    Led1_Group.Led1_BattAmpLimit        := 0;
                    Relay_Out_Data.RlyOut_7_BattAmpLimit    := 0;
                    Rly_BattAmpsLimitBit                      := 0;
               end;
             
        end;


      ValueDivide(Read_TotalAmps, 255);
      Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 24, Row6, Black);
      
      Read_OutAmps  := ABS(Read_TotalAmps - Read_BattAmps);
      
      if (Read_OutAmps >= (DcOutAmpsSet*0.993)) then // redresör akım sınırlama 30A' e set edilmişse 30x0,993= 29,79A' de Akım Sınırlama diyecek
        begin
             RedAmpsLimitBit                     := 1;
             Led2_Group.Led2_RedAmpLimit         := 1;
             Relay_Out_Data.RlyOut_8_RedAmpLimit := 1;
             Rly_RedAmpsLimitBit                 := 1;
        end else
      if (Read_OutAmps < (DcOutAmpsSet*0.992)) then
        begin
             RedAmpsLimitBit                     := 0;
             LogBit_Rlimit                       := 0;
             Led2_Group.Led2_RedAmpLimit         := 0;
             Relay_Out_Data.RlyOut_8_RedAmpLimit := 0;
             Rly_RedAmpsLimitBit                 := 0;
        end;

      if (Read_RedVolt >7) then
        begin
             Red_Volt_Temp := Read_RedVolt - 7;  // GTT kartı parallelleme diyodu üzerindeki gerilimi ekler ve buradan o eklenen gerilim çıkartılır
        end else
      if (Read_RedVolt < 7) then Red_Volt_Temp := 0;
      
      ValueDivide(Red_Volt_Temp, 255);
      Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 24, Row3, Black);
      
      {ValueDivide(Read_BatteryVolt, 255);
      Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 18, Row3, Black);}


      ValueDivide(Read_LoadVolt, 255);
      Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 24, Row4, Black);
      
      {Read_U1Volt := 401;
      Read_U2Volt := 408;
      Read_U3Volt := 394;
      Read_U1Amps := 145;
      Read_U2Amps := 151;
      Read_U3Amps := 129;
      Read_Freq   := 500; denemek için yazılmıştı datalar okununca kullanılmayacak }
      
      if (AcViewScreenBit = 0) then
        begin
        
          //***********Gelen datalar kök3 ile çarpılır ve Trifaze gerilim bulunur*******************

          AcVoltReal  := Read_U1VoltRaw * 173;
          Read_U1Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

          AcVoltReal  := Read_U2VoltRaw * 173;
          Read_U2Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

          AcVoltReal  := Read_U3VoltRaw * 173;
          Read_U3Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

        //***********Gelen datalar kök3 ile çarpılır ve Trifaze gerilim bulunur*******************

        
          ValueDivide(Read_U1Volt, 0);
          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row3, Black);

          ValueDivide(Read_U2Volt, 0);
          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);

          ValueDivide(Read_U3Volt, 0);
          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
        end else
      if (AcViewScreenBit = 255) then
        begin
          ValueDivide(Read_U1Amps, 255);
          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row3, Black);


          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);

          ValueDivide(Read_U3Amps, 255);
          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
        end;
        
      ValueDivide(Read_Freq, 255);
      ltrim(Value_Text);
      Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row6, Black);
      


 
 
 
 
 end;
//******************************************************************************
procedure Led_Test;
var Temp1  : byte;
    Temp2  : byte;
begin
      Temp1 := 0;
      Temp2 := 0;

      for temp1 := 1 to 8 do
        begin
             HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
             HC595_CS1_Pin := 0;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);



             Case (Temp1) of
              1: temp2 := 128;
              2: temp2 := 192;
              3: temp2 := 224;
              4: temp2 := 240;
              5: temp2 := 248;
              6: temp2 := 252;
              7: temp2 := 254;
              8: temp2 := 255;
             end;

             SPI1_Write(Temp2);
             Pause_Ms(25);
             
             asm ClrWDT; end;

             HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
        end;
        
        
      Temp1 := 0;
      Temp2 := 0;

      for temp1 := 1 to 8 do
        begin
             HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
             HC595_CS2_Pin := 0;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);


             Case (Temp1) of
              1: temp2 := 128;
              2: temp2 := 192;
              3: temp2 := 224;
              4: temp2 := 240;
              5: temp2 := 248;
              6: temp2 := 252;
              7: temp2 := 254;
              8: temp2 := 255;
             end;

             SPI1_Write(Temp2);
             Pause_Ms(25);
             
             asm ClrWDT; end;

             HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
        end;
        
        
        
      Temp1 := 0;
      Temp2 := 0;

      for temp1 := 1 to 8 do
        begin
             HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
             HC595_CS3_Pin := 0;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);

             Case (Temp1) of
              1: temp2 := 1;
              2: temp2 := 3;
              3: temp2 := 7;
              4: temp2 := 15;
              5: temp2 := 31;
              6: temp2 := 63;
              7: temp2 := 127;
              8: temp2 := 255;
             end;

             SPI1_Write(Temp2);
             Pause_Ms(25);
             
             asm ClrWDT; end;

             HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
             Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
        end;
      
      Check_Modbus;
      Pause_Ms(250);
      
      Check_Modbus;
      Pause_Ms(250);
      
      Check_Modbus;
      Pause_Ms(250);
      
      Check_Modbus;
      Pause_Ms(250);

      asm ClrWDT; end;
      
      Check_Modbus;
      Pause_Ms(250);
        
      HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      HC595_CS3_Pin := 0;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      
      SPI1_Write(0x00);
      
      HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      
      
      
      
      HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      HC595_CS2_Pin := 0;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);

      SPI1_Write(0x00);

      HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      
      
      
      
      
      HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
      HC595_CS1_Pin := 0;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);

      SPI1_Write(0x00);

      HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
      Delay_Cyc_Long(5);
        
        
end;
//******************************************************************************
procedure Start_Screen;
var Text : string[21];
    A_Text : string[5];

  begin
      {
      Glcd_Write_Text('Donanım Kontrolü...  ',0,Row1,Black);
      Pause_Ms(1000);
      ClrWDT;
      
      Glcd_Write_Text('Başarılı.            ',0,Row1,Black);
      Pause_Ms(1000);
      ClrWDT;
      
      
      Glcd_Write_Text('Yazılım Kontrolü...  ',0,Row1,Black);
      Pause_Ms(1000);
      ClrWDT;
      Glcd_Write_Text('Başarılı.            ',0,Row1,Black);
      Pause_Ms(1000);
      ClrWDT;
      }
      Glcd_Write_Text('Yazılım Versiyon: 2.2',0,Row2,Black);
      Glcd_Write_Text('Donanım Versiyon: 2.0',0,Row3,Black);
      Glcd_Write_Text('DSP Controller  : FIR',0,Row4,Black);
      Pause_Ms(1000);
      ClrWDT;

      Glcd_Write_Text('Veriler Okunuyor..',0,Row5,Black);

      HucreSayisi         := EEPROM_Read(EE_HucreSayisiEeAddr);
      Pause_Ms(100);
      RedresorAkim        := EEPROM_Read(EE_RedresorAkimEeAddr);
      Pause_Ms(100);
      
      Glcd_Write_Text('Sistem Test...   ',0,Row6,black);
      Led_Test;
      
      Glcd_Image(@StartLogo); // açılış logosu
      
      WordToStr(RedresorAkim,A_Text);
      ltrim(A_Text);
      
      if (HucreSayisi = 12) then
        begin
             Text := 'GRR3024-L 24VDC-'+A_Text+'A';
        end else
      if (HucreSayisi = 24) then
        begin
             Text := 'GRR3048-L 48VDC-'+A_Text+'A';
        end else
      if ((HucreSayisi = 54)or(HucreSayisi = 55)) then
        begin
             Text := 'GRR3110-L 110VDC-'+A_Text+'A';
        end else
      if ((HucreSayisi = 108)or(HucreSayisi = 110)) then
        begin
             Text := 'GRR3220-L 220VDC-'+A_Text+'A';
        end;
      

      Glcd_Write_Text(Text,5, Row6, Black);


      

      


      
  end;
//******************************************************************************
procedure Operation_Mode; // redresör çalışma modu
 begin
 
      if (AutoBFMode = 0) then // otomatik hızlı normal şarj geçişi kapalı ise
        begin
            
            Led2_Group.Led2_AutoCharge := 0;
            
            if (ChargeMode = Manuel) then // şarj modu Manuel seçilmişse
              begin
                  BatteryAmpsSet          := EEPROM_Read(EE_BatteryAmpsManuelEeAddr);
                  RectifierVoltage_Set    := DCOutVoltSet; // Manuel şarjda gerilimi redresör geirlimi oldu
                  BTBit                   := 1;
                  Glcd_Write_Text('        ', 78, Row7, Black);
                  Glcd_Write_Text(ManualChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                  
                  Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 1;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 0;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 0;
                  Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 0;
                  
              end else
            if (ChargeMode = Float) then // şarj modu Float ise
              begin
                  BatteryAmpsSet          := EEPROM_Read(EE_BatteryAmpsFloatEeAddr);
                  RectifierVoltage_Set    := FloatChargeVoltage;
                  BTBit                   := 1;
                  Glcd_Write_Text('        ', 78, Row7, Black);
                  Glcd_Write_Text(FloatChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                  
                  Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 0;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 0;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 1;
                  Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 0;
                  
              end else
            if (ChargeMode = Boost) then // hızlı şarj gerilimi seçilmişse
              begin
                  BatteryAmpsSet          := EEPROM_Read(EE_BatteryAmpsBoostEeAddr);
                  RectifierVoltage_Set    := BoostChargeVoltage;
                  Glcd_Write_Text(BoostChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                  if (BTBit =1) then
                    begin
                        BoostChargeTime := BoostChargeTimeSet;
                        BTBit           := 0;
                    end;

                  BCTimeCountBit          := 255; // hızlı şarj süresi sayacı için izin verildi.

                  if (BoostChargeTime < 1) then
                    begin
                        BoostChargeTimeSet := EEPROM_Read(EE_BoostChargeTimeEeAddr); // zaman dolunca süreyi tekrar oku
                        Pause_Ms(10);
                        BoostChargeTime    := BoostChargeTimeSet;


                        EEPROM_Write(EE_ChargeModeEeAddr, Float); // şarj modunu Float olarak kaydet
                        while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                        ChargeMode := EEPROM_Read(EE_ChargeModeEeAddr);
                        Pause_Ms(50);

                    end;
                  
                  ValueDivide(BoostChargeTime,0);
                  Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 78, Row7, Black); // hızlı şarj süresini yaz
                  Glcd_Write_Text(MinuteText, 108, Row7, Black);
                  
                  Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 0;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 1;
                  Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 0;
                  Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 0;
                    
              end else
            if (ChargeMode = TComp) then
              begin
                   BatteryAmpsSet          := EEPROM_Read(EE_BatteryAmpsTCompEeAddr);
                   RectifierVoltage_Set    := TempComp_Volt;
                   Glcd_Write_Text(TCompChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                   Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 0;
                   Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 0;
                   Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 0;
                   Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 1;
              
              end;
              
        end else
      if (AutoBFMode = 1) then // otomatik hızlı normal şarj geçişi açık ise
        begin
             
             Led2_Group.Led2_AutoCharge := 1;
             
             if (Read_BattAmps >= BoostChargeLimit) then // okunan akü akımı, set edilen hızlı şarj limitinden büyükse
               begin
                    RectifierVoltage_Set    := BoostChargeVoltage; // hızlı şarj gerilimine ayarla
                    ChargeMode              := Boost; // hızlı şarj moduna geçildi
                    Glcd_Write_Text(BoostChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                    
                    Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 0;
                    Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 1;
                    Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 0;
                    Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 0;
                    
               end else
             if (Read_BattAmps < FloatChargeLimit) then // okunan akü akımı, set edilen normal şarj limitinden küçükse
               begin
                    RectifierVoltage_Set    := FloatChargeVoltage; // normal şarj gerilimine ayarla
                    ChargeMode              := Float; // normal şarj moduna geçildi
                    Glcd_Write_Text(FloatChargeText, 0, Row7, Black);
                    
                    Led2_Group.Led2_ManualCharge := 0;
                    Led2_Group.Led2_BoostCharge  := 0;
                    Led2_Group.Led2_FloatCharge  := 1;
                    Led3_Group.Led3_TempComp     := 0;
                    
               end;
             

        
        
        end;

 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure AlarmYaz;
var LeakText : array [1..21] of char;
 begin
     Case (AlarmSira) of
        1: begin // achigh

               if (AcHighFaultBit = 1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_AcHigh,0,row8,Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;

           end;
        2: begin // aclow

               if (AcLowFaultBit =1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_AcLow,0,row8,Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
        3: begin
              if (DcHighBit = 1) then
                begin
                    Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DcHigh, 0, Row8, Black);
                    BuzzerBit := 1;
                end;
           end;
        4: begin
               if (DcLowBit = 1) then
                begin
                    Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DcLow, 0, Row8, Black);
                    BuzzerBit := 1;
                end;
           end;
        5: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_Pleakage, 0, Row8, Black);
               if (Read_LoadVolt > 100) then // 10,0V' dan küçükse kaçak akımlara bakma
                 begin
                   if (Pos_Leakage_bit = 1) then // + kaçak gelmişse
                     begin
                          //ValueDivide(R_Leakage,0);
                          //LeakText := '   '+Flt_Pleakage + '-' + Value_Text + 'k';
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_Pleakage, 0, Row8, Black);
                          BuzzerBit := 1;

                     end;
                 end;
               //AlarmSira := 6;
           end;
        6: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_Nleakage, 0, Row8, Black);
               if (Read_LoadVolt > 100) then // 10,0V' dan küçükse kaçak akımlara bakma
                 begin
                   if (Neg_Leakage_bit = 1) then // - kaçak gelmişse
                     begin
                          //ValueDivide(R_Leakage,0);
                          //LeakText := '   '+Flt_Nleakage + '-' + Value_Text + 'k';
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_Nleakage, 0, Row8, Black);
                          BuzzerBit := 1;

                     end;
                 end;
               //AlarmSira := 7;
           end;
        7: begin
              // Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_BattLimit, 0, Row8, Black);
               if (BattAmpsLimitBit = 1) then
                 begin
                    Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_BattLimit, 0, Row8, Black);
                    BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
        8: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_ChrgLimit, 0, Row8, Black);
               if (RedAmpsLimitBit = 1) then
                 begin
                    Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_ChrgLimit, 0, Row8, Black);
                    BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
        9: begin
               if ((FanOnBit = 1)and(FanFaultBit = 1)) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_FanFault, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
       10: begin
               if (TempHighBit = 1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_HighTemp, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
       11: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_BattReverse, 0, Row8, Black); akü ters iptal edildiği için
               AlarmSira := 12; // burası şimdilik kullanılmayacak
           end;
       12: begin
               if (Ac_MCB_Bit = 1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_AcMCB, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
       13: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DcMCB, 0, Row8, Black);
               if (Load_MCB_Bit = 1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DcMCB, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;
       14: begin
               //Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_BattMCB, 0, Row8, Black);
              if (Batt_MCB_Bit = 1) then
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_BattMCB, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                 end;
           end;

       15: begin
               if (ThryCommFault = 255) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_ThryComm, 0, Row8, Black);
                 end else
               if (ThryCommFault = 0) then
                 begin
                      //Glcd_Write_Text('                     ', 0, Row8, Black);
                      //AlarmSira := 17;
                 end;
           end;
       16: begin
               if (AcCommFault = 255) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_AcMult, 0, Row8, Black);
                 end;
           end;
       17: begin
               if (RlyCommFault = 255) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_Rly, 0, Row8, Black);
                 end;

           end;
       18: begin
               if (RedFaultBit = 1) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_RedFault, 0, Row8, Black);
                 end;
           end;
       19: begin
                if (DDschargeBit = 1) then
                  begin
                      Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DDschrg, 0, Row8, Black);
                      BuzzerBit := 1;
                  end;
           end;
       20: begin
               if (Read_Temp = 1) then // redresör aşırı sıcaklıktan kapanmışsa
                 begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_RedHighTemp, 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 1;
                     Red_HighTemp := 1;
                 end else
                 begin
                     Red_HighTemp       := 0;
                     LogBit_RedHighTemp := 0;
                 end;
           end;
       21: begin
              // Glcd_Write_Text(Flt_DDschrg, 0, Row8, Black);
                   AlarmSira := 1;

              if ((AcHighFaultBit =0)and(AcLowFaultBit =0)and(DcHighBit =0)and(DcLowBit =0)and(Pos_Leakage_bit =0)and
                  (Neg_Leakage_bit =0)and(BattAmpsLimitBit =0)and(RedAmpsLimitBit =0)and((FanOnBit =0)or(FanFaultBit =0))and
                  (TempHighBit =0)and(Ac_MCB_Bit =0)and(Load_MCB_Bit =0)and(Batt_MCB_Bit =0)and(ThryCommFault =0)and
                  (AcCommFault =0)and(RlyCommFault =0)and(RedFaultBit =0)and(DDschargeBit =0)and(Read_Temp =0)) then

                begin
                     Glcd_Write_Text('    SİSTEM NORMAL    ', 0, Row8, Black);
                     BuzzerBit := 0;
                end;


           end;
 
 
     end;
 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure AC_CalibrationMenu;
var AC_CompleteBit    : bit;
    ACCalib_MenuSayac : byte;
    SampleText        : array [1..5] of char;
    i : byte;

 begin

      AC_CompleteBit    := 0;
      ACCalib_MenuSayac := 1;
      SampleText        := '     ';
      Chng[1]           := 0;
      Chng[2]           := 0;
      Chng[3]           := 0;
      Chng[4]           := 0;
      Chng[5]           := 0;
      Chng[6]           := 0;
      i                 := 0;

      Glcd_Fill(0x00);
      Glcd_Image(@Ac_CalibrationSet_En1);
      

 
      While (AC_CompleteBit =0) do
       begin
       
            Comm_StatusBit := 1; // haberleşme durum biti, 0= bütün datalar, 1= sadece AC datalar
            asm ClrWDT; end;
       
            if (Hidden_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Hidden_Button =0) do
                   begin
                       asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;
                   
                   Buzzer := 1;
                   Pause_Ms(100);
                   Buzzer := 0;
                   
                   Comm_StatusBit := 1; // haberleşme durum biti, 0= bütün datalar, 1= sadece AC datalar
                                        // program bu döngü içinde sürekli olarak ac dataları gönderecek
                   
                   Glcd_Fill(0x00);
                   
                   Request_Counter := 15; // AC dataların başlangıç paketi
                   
                  for i:= 1 to 60 do //5sn sonra data kontrolü yap
                    begin
                        Glcd_Write_Text('Please Wait...         ',0,row1,Black);
                        Glcd_Write_Text('Datas are Sending...   ',0,row2,Black);
                        Pause_Ms(100);
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                    end;
                    
                  if (AcCommFault = 255) then // ac kartında haberleşme yoksa yeniden gönder
                    begin
                         AC_CompleteBit := 0;
                         Glcd_Write_Text('Sorry!  Warning!     ',0,row1,Black);
                         Glcd_Write_Text('Comm Fault, try again',0,row2,Black);
                    end else
                  if (AcCommFault = 0) then // ac kartında haberleşme varsa
                    begin
                         AC_CompleteBit := 1;
                         Glcd_Write_Text('Good!! Datas Transfer',0,row1,Black);
                         Glcd_Write_Text('Completed...         ',0,row2,Black);
                         
                         Request_Counter := 0; // bütün dataların başlangıç paketi
                         Comm_StatusBit := 0; // haberleşme durum biti, 0= bütün datalar, 1= sadece AC datalar
                         asm ClrWDT; end;
                         
                    end;

                  for i:= 1 to 10 do //2sn bekle
                    begin
                        Pause_Ms(200);
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                    end;

                  Glcd_Fill(0x00);
                  Glcd_Image(@Ac_CalibrationSet_En1);




              end;
       
            if (Down_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Down_Button =0) do
                   begin
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;

                   Inc(ACCalib_MenuSayac);
                   if (ACCalib_MenuSayac > 6) then ACCalib_MenuSayac := 1;

              end else
            if (Up_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Up_Button =0) do
                   begin
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;

                   Dec(ACCalib_MenuSayac);
                   if (ACCalib_MenuSayac < 1) then ACCalib_MenuSayac := 6;

              end;
            
            asm ClrWDT; end;
            
            WordToStr(U1VoltRefValue, SampleText);
            Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row3, Black);
            
            WordToStr(U2VoltRefValue, SampleText);
            Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row4, Black);
                       
            WordToStr(U3VoltRefValue, SampleText);
            Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row5, Black);

            AcVoltReal  := Read_U1VoltRaw * 100;
            Read_U1Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

            AcVoltReal  := Read_U2VoltRaw * 100;
            Read_U2Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

            AcVoltReal  := Read_U3VoltRaw * 100;
            Read_U3Volt := AcVoltReal div 100;

            ValueDivide(Read_U1Volt, 0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row3, Black);
            
            ValueDivide(Read_U2Volt, 0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);
            
            ValueDivide(Read_U3Volt, 0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
            
            
            
            ValueDivide(U1AmpsRefValue, 255);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row6, Black);
            
            ValueDivide(U2AmpsRefValue, 255);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row7, Black);
            
            ValueDivide(U3AmpsRefValue, 255);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row8, Black);

           ValueDivide(Read_U1Amps, 255);
           Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row6, Black);
           
           ValueDivide(Read_U2Amps, 255);
           Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row7, Black);
           
           ValueDivide(Read_U3Amps, 255);
           Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row8, Black);
       
       
            Case (ACCalib_MenuSayac) of
            
              1: begin // U1 Volt ayarı
              
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);
                       


                       
                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;
                               
                             Chng[1] := 1;
                             
                             while (Chng[1] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U1VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U1VoltRefValue > 300) then  // 300V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U1VoltRefValue := 300;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U1VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U1VoltRefValue < 150) then // 150V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U1VoltRefValue := 150;
                                  end;


                                 WordToStr(U1VoltRefValue, SampleText);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row3, White);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U1VoltRefValuEeAddr, U1VoltRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                       
                                       Chng[1] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;
                         
                         
                         
                         
                         
                         
                         end;
                         
                         

              
                 end;
            
              2: begin // U2 Volt ayarı

                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);






                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;

                             Chng[2] := 1;

                             while (Chng[2] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U2VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U2VoltRefValue > 300) then  // 300V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U2VoltRefValue := 300;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U2VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U2VoltRefValue < 150) then // 150V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U2VoltRefValue := 150;
                                  end;


                                 WordToStr(U2VoltRefValue, SampleText);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row4, White);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U2VoltRefValuEeAddr, U2VoltRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[2] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;






                         end;




                 end;
            
              3: begin // U3 Volt ayarı

                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);


                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;

                             Chng[3] := 1;

                             while (Chng[3] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U3VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U3VoltRefValue > 300) then  // 300V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U3VoltRefValue := 300;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U3VoltRefValue);
                                      if (U3VoltRefValue < 150) then // 150V' a kadar (230V üzerinden)
                                          U3VoltRefValue := 150;
                                  end;


                                 WordToStr(U3VoltRefValue, SampleText);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(SampleText, 48, Row5, White);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U3VoltRefValuEeAddr, U3VoltRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[3] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;






                         end;




                 end;
            
            
              4: begin // U1 Akım ayarı

                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);



                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;

                             Chng[4] := 1;

                             while (Chng[4] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U1AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U1AmpsRefValue > 2500) then  // 250AV' e kadar
                                          U1AmpsRefValue := 2500;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U1AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U1AmpsRefValue < 1) then // 0.1' a kadar
                                          U1AmpsRefValue := 1;
                                  end;


                                 ValueDivide(U1AmpsRefValue, 255);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row6, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U1AmpsRefValuEeAddr, U1AmpsRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[4] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;
                         end;




                 end;
            
            
              5: begin // U2 Akım ayarı

                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);




                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;

                             Chng[5] := 1;

                             while (Chng[5] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U2AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U2AmpsRefValue > 2500) then  // 250AV' e kadar
                                          U2AmpsRefValue := 2500;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U2AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U2AmpsRefValue < 1) then // 0.1' a kadar
                                          U2AmpsRefValue := 1;
                                  end;


                                 ValueDivide(U2AmpsRefValue, 255);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row7, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U2AmpsRefValuEeAddr, U2AmpsRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[5] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;
                         end;




                 end;
            
            
              6: begin // U3 Akım ayarı

                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row8,Black);

                       ValueDivide(U3AmpsRefValue, 255);
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row8, Black);

                       ValueDivide(Read_U3Amps, 255);
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row8, Black);


                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                         begin
                             while (Ok_Button =0) do
                               begin
                                   asm ClrWDT; end;
                               end;

                             Chng[6] := 1;

                             while (Chng[6] =1) do
                              begin

                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(U3AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U3AmpsRefValue > 2500) then  // 250AV' e kadar
                                          U3AmpsRefValue := 2500;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(U3AmpsRefValue);
                                      if (U3AmpsRefValue < 1) then // 0.1' a kadar
                                          U3AmpsRefValue := 1;
                                  end;


                                 ValueDivide(U3AmpsRefValue, 255);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row8, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                   begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;


                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_U3AmpsRefValuEeAddr, U3AmpsRefValue);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[6] := 0;

                                   end;

                              end;
                         end;




                 end;
            end;
       end;
 
 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure GTT_CalibrationMenu(); // GTT Kartı Kalibrasyon ekranı
var Chng : array [1..7] of byte;
    GTT_MenuExit : bit;
    GTT_MenuCounter : byte;
    i               : bit;
    Temp_Text       : string[4];
  begin

       Comm_StatusBit  := 2;

       GTT_MenuExit    := 0;
       GTT_MenuCounter := 1;
       i               := 0;
  
       Glcd_Fill(0x00);
       
       BattAmps_Calib   := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_BattAmpsCalibEeAddr);
       Delay_ms(10);
       RedAmps_Calib    := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_RedAmpsCalibEeAddr);
       Delay_ms(10);
       RedVolt_Calib    := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_RedVoltCalibEeAddr);
       Delay_ms(10);
       Temp_Calib       := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_TempCalibEeAddr);
       Delay_ms(10);
       

       

       while (GTT_MenuExit = 0) do
        begin

             asm ClrWDT; end;

             if (Down_Button =0) then
               begin
                   while (Down_Button =0) do
                    begin
                         asm ClrWDT; end;
                    end;
                    
                    Inc(GTT_MenuCounter);
                    if (GTT_MenuCounter > 7) then GTT_MenuCounter := 1;
                    
               end else
             if (Up_Button =0) then
               begin
                   while (Up_Button =0) do
                    begin
                         asm ClrWDT; end;
                    end;

                    Dec(GTT_MenuCounter);
                    if (GTT_MenuCounter < 1) then GTT_MenuCounter := 7;

               end;
               
             if ((GTT_MenuCounter >= 1)and(GTT_MenuCounter < 7)) then // bu sayılara göre menü ekranı yüklenecektir.
               begin
                    if (i =0) then
                      begin
                          Glcd_Image(@GTT_CalibrationSet_Page1_En);
                          
                          ValueDivide(Read_BattAmps,255); // GTT Kartından okunan akü akımı
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row3, Black);
                          
                          ValueDivide(Read_TotalAmps,255);  // GTT Kartından okunan toplam akımı
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);
                          
                          ValueDivide(Read_RedVolt,255);  // GTT Kartından okunan redresör gerilimi
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
                          
                          ValueDivide(Read_Temp,0);   // GTT Kartından okunan soğutucu sıcaklığı
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row6, Black);
                          
                          ShortToStr(BattAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row3, Black);

                          ShortToStr(RedAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row4, Black);

                          ShortToStr(RedVolt_Calib, Temp_Text);
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row5, Black);

                          ShortToStr(Temp_Calib, Temp_Text);
                          Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row6, Black);
                          
                          i := 1;
                      end;
               end else
             if (GTT_MenuCounter > 6) then
               begin
                    if (i =1) then
                      begin
                          Glcd_Image(@GTT_CalibrationSet_Page2_En);
                          i := 0;
                      end;
               end;
        
             case (GTT_MenuCounter) of
              1:  begin  // akü akımı set
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);
                       
                       ValueDivide(Read_BattAmps,255); // GTT Kartından okunan akü akımı
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row3, Black);
                       
                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;

                           Chng[1] := 1;
                           while (Chng[1] = 1) do
                            begin
                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(BattAmps_Calib);
                                      if (BattAmps_Calib > 127) then BattAmps_Calib := -127;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(BattAmps_Calib);
                                      if (BattAmps_Calib < -127) then BattAmps_Calib := 127;
                                  end;
                            
                                 ShortToStr(BattAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row3, white);
                                 
                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                  
                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do 
                                         begin 
                                           asm ClrWDT; end; 
                                         end;
                                       
                                       Glcd_Write_Text(' Ok  ', 48,Row3,Black);
                                  
                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_dV_BattAmpsCalibEeAddr, BattAmps_Calib);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                       Delay_ms(250);
                                       
                                       BattAmps_CalibSend := ((BattAmps_Calib) +1000);
                                       
                                       ShortToStr(BattAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                       Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row3, Black);
                                       
                                       Chng[1] := 0;

                                  end;
                            end;
                      end;
                       
                       
                       
                  end;
             
              2:  begin  // redresör akımı set
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       
                       ValueDivide(Read_TotalAmps,255);  // GTT Kartından okunan toplam akımı
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);

                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;

                           Chng[2] := 1;
                           while (Chng[2] = 1) do
                            begin
                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(RedAmps_Calib);
                                      if (RedAmps_Calib > 127) then RedAmps_Calib := -127;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(RedAmps_Calib);
                                      if (RedAmps_Calib < -127) then RedAmps_Calib := 127;
                                  end;

                                 ShortToStr(RedAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row4, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                           asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;

                                       Glcd_Write_Text(' Ok  ', 48,Row4,Black);

                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_dV_RedAmpsCalibEeAddr, RedAmps_Calib);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                       Delay_ms(250);

                                       RedAmps_CalibSend := ((RedAmps_Calib) +1000);

                                       ShortToStr(RedAmps_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                       Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row4, Black);

                                       Chng[2] := 0;

                                  end;
                            end;
                      end;

                  end;
             
              3:  begin  // redresör gerilimi set
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       
                       ValueDivide(Read_RedVolt,255);  // GTT Kartından okunan redresör gerilimi
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
                       
                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;

                           Chng[3] := 1;
                           while (Chng[3] = 1) do
                            begin
                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(RedVolt_Calib);
                                      if (RedVolt_Calib > 127) then RedVolt_Calib := -127;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(RedVolt_Calib);
                                      if (RedVolt_Calib < -127) then RedVolt_Calib := 127;
                                  end;

                                 ShortToStr(RedVolt_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row5, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                           asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;

                                       Glcd_Write_Text(' Ok  ', 48,Row5,Black);

                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_dV_RedVoltCalibEeAddr, RedVolt_Calib);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                       Delay_ms(250);

                                       RedVolt_CalibSend := ((RedVolt_Calib) +1000);

                                       ShortToStr(RedVolt_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                       Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row5, Black);

                                       Chng[3] := 0;

                                  end;
                            end;
                      end;



                  end;
             
              4:  begin  // soğutucu sıcaklık set
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       
                       ValueDivide(Read_Temp,0);   // GTT Kartından okunan soğutucu sıcaklığı
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row6, Black);
                       
                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;

                           Chng[4] := 1;
                           while (Chng[4] = 1) do
                            begin
                                 if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(Temp_Calib);
                                      if (Temp_Calib > 127) then Temp_Calib := -127;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(Temp_Calib);
                                      if (Temp_Calib < -127) then Temp_Calib := 127;
                                  end;

                                 ShortToStr(Temp_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                 Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row6, white);

                                 if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                           asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;

                                       Glcd_Write_Text(' Ok  ', 48,Row6,Black);

                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_dV_TempCalibEeAddr, Temp_Calib);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                       Delay_ms(250);

                                       Temp_CalibSend := ((Temp_Calib) +1000);

                                       ShortToStr(Temp_Calib, Temp_Text);
                                       Glcd_Write_Text(Temp_Text, 48, Row6, Black);

                                       Chng[4] := 0;

                                  end;
                            end;
                      end;



                  end;

              5:  begin  // dataları gönder
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);
                       
                       if (GTTCompleteBit = 1) then
                          begin
                               Glcd_Write_Text('  Ok.',48,Row7,Black);
                          end;
                       
                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                          begin
                            while (Ok_Button =0) do
                              begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                              end;
                            
                            if (GTTCompleteBit =0) then
                              begin
                                   Glcd_Write_Text('Send.',48,Row7,Black);
                              end;


                            SendRepeatCounter  := 0;
                            Request_Counter    := 9;
                            GTTSendDataConfirm := 255; // dataların gönderilmesine izin ver



                          end;



                  end;

              6:  begin  // geri
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row8,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);

                       if (Ok_Button =0) then
                          begin
                            while (Ok_Button =0) do
                              begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                              end;

                            GTT_MenuExit := 1;

                          end;



                  end;



              7:  begin  // ikinci sayfa sadece izleme
                       Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row2,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row3,Black);
                       Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);
                       
                       ValueDivide(Read_Alpha,0);   // GTT Kartından okunan alpha değeri
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 96, Row2, Black);

                       ValueDivide(Read_Phases,31); // GTT Kartından okunan fazların değeri
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 96, Row3, Black);

                       ValueDivide(Read_DSW,31);    // GTT Kartından okunan dip switch değeri
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 96, Row4, Black);

                       ValueDivide(Read_NomVolt,0);   // GTT Kartından okunan nominal gerilim değeri
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 96, Row5, Black);

                       ValueDivide(Read_NomAmp,0);   // GTT Kartından okunan nominal akım değeri
                       Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 96, Row6, Black);


                  end;




             
             end;
        
        
        end;
  
  end;
//******************************************************************************
procedure Calibration_Menu;
var CompleteBit  : bit;
    Org_LoadVolt,Org_BatteryVolt : word;
    SimpleText : array[1..6] of Char;
    Calib_MenuSayac : byte;
    Chng : array[1..2] of byte;
 begin
      CompleteBit    := 0;
      Org_LoadVolt   := 0;
      MenuExit       := 0;
      MenuSayacValue := 1;
      Calib_MenuSayac:= 1;
      
      Glcd_Fill(0x00);
      
      Glcd_Image(@Calibration_Set);
      
      diff_leak_pos := EEPROM_Read(EE_Data_Diff_leak_pos);
      ShortToStr(diff_leak_pos, SimpleText);
      Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row6,Black);
      
      diff_leak_neg := EEPROM_Read(EE_Data_Diff_leak_neg);
      ShortToStr(diff_leak_neg, SimpleText);
      Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row7,Black);
      

      
      while (CompleteBit =0) do
       begin

            Comm_StatusBit := 0; // haberleşme durum biti, 0= bütün datalar, 1= sadece AC datalar
            asm ClrWDT; end;

            if (Hidden_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Hidden_Button =0) do
                   begin
                       asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;
                   
                   CompleteBit := 1;
                   Buzzer := 1;
                   Pause_Ms(100);
                   Buzzer := 0;
                   
              end;

            if (Down_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Down_Button =0) do
                   begin
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;
                   
                   Inc(Calib_MenuSayac);
                   if (Calib_MenuSayac > 5) then Calib_MenuSayac := 1;
                   
              end else
            if (Up_Button =0) then
              begin
                  while (Up_Button =0) do
                   begin
                        asm ClrWDT; end;
                   end;

                   Dec(Calib_MenuSayac);
                   if (Calib_MenuSayac < 1) then Calib_MenuSayac := 5;

              end;
            asm ClrWDT; end;
            
            AnalogRead(9);
            Dig_LoadVolt := Adc_Value;
            ValueDivide(Dig_LoadVolt,0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row4, Black);

            Org_LoadVolt := 3244; // bütün nominal gerilimlerde 4V --> 3244
            ValueDivide(Org_LoadVolt,0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);
            
            
            //AnalogRead(10);
            //Dig_BatteryVolt := Adc_Value;
            //ValueDivide(Dig_BatteryVolt,0);
            //Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row5, Black);

            Org_BatteryVolt := 3244; // bütün nominal gerilimlerde 4V --> 3244
            ValueDivide(Org_BatteryVolt,0);
            Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row5, Black);
            
            Case (Calib_MenuSayac) of
             1: begin  // loadvolt calibration

                     Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row4,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);


                     if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;
                             
                           dV_LoadVolt := (Dig_LoadVolt - Org_LoadVolt);
                           ValueDivide(dV_LoadVolt, 0);
                           LongInttoStr(dV_LoadVolt,SimpleText);
                           ltrim(SimpleText);
                           Glcd_Write_Text('      ',90,row4,Black);
                           Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 90, row4, Black);

                           dV_LoadVolt := (dV_LoadVolt)+1000;               // - işaretli olursa eproma kayıt edilemez
                           EEPROM_Write(EE_dV_LoadVoltEeAddr, dV_LoadVolt); // bu yüzden hep 1000 ile toplanır ve epromdan
                           while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting                // okunduğunda 1000 çıkartılır
                           Pause_Ms(800);
                           Glcd_Write_Text('      ',90,row4,Black);

                       end;
             
                end;
            
             2: begin  // GTT-I Calibration

                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row5,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);



                     if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;

                           GTT_CalibrationMenu;
                           Glcd_Image(@Calibration_Set);

                       end;

                end;
            
             3: begin  // + leakage calibration

                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row6,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);

                     //Dig_LoadVolt := AnalogRead(9);
                     ///ValueDivide(Dig_LoadVolt,0);
                     //Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row4, Black);

                     //Org_LoadVolt := 3276; // bütün nominal gerilimlerde 4V --> 3276
                     //ValueDivide(Org_LoadVolt,0);
                     //Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);

                     ShortToStr(diff_leak_pos, SimpleText);
                     Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row6,Black);
                     
                     
                     if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;


                           Chng[1] := 1;
                           
                           While (Chng[1] = 1) do
                            begin
                                asm ClrWDT; end;
                                
                                if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(diff_leak_pos);
                                      if (diff_leak_pos >100) then diff_leak_pos := -100;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(diff_leak_pos);
                                      if (diff_leak_pos < -100) then diff_leak_pos := 100;
                                  end;
                                  
                                ShortToStr(diff_leak_pos, SimpleText);
                                Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row6,white);
                                
                                if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;
                                  
                                       Glcd_Write_Text('OK', 90, Row6, Black);
                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_Data_Diff_leak_pos, diff_leak_pos);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting
                                  
                                       Chng[1] := 0;
                                  
                                  end;
                            
                            
                            end;

                       end;
                end;
            
              4: begin  // - leakage calibration

                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row7,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row8,Black);

                     //Dig_LoadVolt := AnalogRead(9);
                     ///ValueDivide(Dig_LoadVolt,0);
                     //Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 48, Row4, Black);

                     //Org_LoadVolt := 3276; // bütün nominal gerilimlerde 4V --> 3276
                     //ValueDivide(Org_LoadVolt,0);
                     //Glcd_Write_Text(Value_Text, 90, Row4, Black);

                     ShortToStr(diff_leak_neg, SimpleText);
                     Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row7,Black);


                     if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                             begin
                                  asm ClrWDT; end;
                             end;


                           Chng[2] := 1;

                           While (Chng[2] = 1) do
                            begin
                                asm ClrWDT; end;

                                if (Up_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Inc(diff_leak_neg);
                                      if (diff_leak_neg >100) then diff_leak_neg := -100;
                                  end else
                                 if (Down_Button =0) then
                                  begin
                                      ButonStop       := 0;
                                      BtCounterNormal := 0;
                                      while (ButonStop = 0) do
                                        begin
                                            asm ClrWDT; end;
                                        end;
                                      Dec(diff_leak_neg);
                                      if (diff_leak_neg < -100) then diff_leak_neg := 100;
                                  end;

                                ShortToStr(diff_leak_neg, SimpleText);
                                Glcd_Write_Text(SimpleText, 48, Row7,white);

                                if (Ok_Button =0) then
                                  begin

                                       while (Ok_Button =0) do
