                                         begin
                                             asm ClrWDT; end;
                                         end;

                                       Glcd_Write_Text('OK', 90, Row7, Black);
                                       EEPROM_Write(EE_Data_Diff_leak_neg, diff_leak_neg);
                                       while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

                                       Chng[2] := 0;

                                  end;


                            end;

                       end;

                end;
            
              5: begin
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row4,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row5,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row6,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char(' ',0, Row7,Black);
                     Glcd_Write_Char('>',0, Row8,Black);
                     
                     if (Ok_Button =0) then
                       begin
                           while (Ok_Button =0) do
                            begin
                                 asm ClrWDT; end;
                            end;
                            
                           AC_CalibrationMenu;
                           Glcd_Image(@Calibration_Set);
                       end;
                     
              
                 end;
            
            
            end;





       
       
       end;


     dV_LoadVolt           := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_LoadVoltEeAddr);
     dV_LoadVolt           := dV_LoadVolt - 1000;
     
     {dV_BatteryVolt        := EEPROM_Read(EE_dV_BatteryVoltEeAddr);
     dV_BatteryVolt        := dV_BatteryVolt - 1000;}
     
     diff_leak_pos := EEPROM_Read(EE_Data_Diff_leak_pos);
     Pause_Ms(100);
     diff_leak_neg := EEPROM_Read(EE_Data_Diff_leak_neg);
     Pause_Ms(100);
 
     Glcd_Fill(0x00);
 
 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure System_TestMenu;
 begin

     MCU_State_LED    := 1;

     Glcd_Write_Text('--SYSTEM TEST MENU--',0,Row1,Black);
     
     Glcd_Write_Text('Dropper-1 Aktif      ',0,Row2,Black);
     Dropper_Out_1    := 1;
     
     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;
     
     Glcd_Write_Text('Dropper-2 Aktif      ',0,Row3,Black);
     Dropper_Out_2    := 1;
     
     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;

     Glcd_Write_Text('Dropper Fanları Aktif',0,Row4,Black);
     Dropper_Out_3    := 1;
     
     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;

     Glcd_Write_Text('Kasa İçi Fanı Aktif  ',0,Row5,Black);
     Fan_Out          := 1;
     
     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;

     Glcd_Write_Text('Kasa Isıtıcısı Aktif ',0,Row6,Black);
     Heater_Output    := 1;
     
     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;

     Glcd_Write_Text('Led Diagram Aktif    ',0,Row7,Black);
     HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS1_Pin := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS2_Pin := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS3_Pin := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);

     SPI1_Write(255);

     HC595_CS1_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS2_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     HC595_CS3_Pin := 1;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);

     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;

     Glcd_Write_Text('Dahili Buzzer Aktif  ',0,Row8,Black);
     
     Buzzer_AllowBit := 1;
     BuzzerBit       := 1;
     

     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;
     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;
     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;
     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;
     

     
     
     Glcd_Fill(0x00);
     Glcd_Write_Text('--SYSTEM TEST MENU-- ',0,Row1,Black);
     Glcd_Write_Text('Test Sonlandırılıyor ',0,Row2,Black);
     
     Pause_Ms(500);
     ClrWDT;
     Buzzer_AllowBit  := 0;
     Buzzer           := 0;
     Fan_Out          := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     Dropper_Out_1    := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     Dropper_Out_2    := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     Dropper_Out_3    := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     Heater_Output    := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);
     MCU_State_LED    := 0;
     Delay_Cyc_Long(1);

     Pause_Ms(1000);
     ClrWDT;

 
 end;
//******************************************************************************
Procedure WDT_Reset_Flag;
var i:byte;
  begin

    i:= 0;
    
    Glcd_Fill(0x00);
    Glcd_Set_Font(@NewFont5x7, 5, 7, 32);     // Change font
    
    if (WDTO_bit = 1) then
      begin
           
           Glcd_Write_Text('Sistem Hatası...',0,Row1,Black);
           Glcd_Write_Text('Yeniden Başlatılıyor',0,row2,Black);
           Glcd_Write_Text('Hata Kodu:0xC0015',0,row3,Black);
           
           for i:= 1 to 5 do
             begin
                  Led_Test;
                  asm ClrWDT; end;

             end;
           
           WDTO_bit := 0; // clear asm ClrWDT; end; flag
           
           
      end;
      
      
  end;
//******************************************************************************
begin
  { Main program }
  
  Pause_Ms(500);
  
  Start_Register_Config;
  
  if (Down_Button =0) then Pause_Ms(3000); // asm ClrWDT; end; kontrolü
  
  WDT_Reset_Flag;
  
  FactoryData          := EEPROM_Read(EE_DefaultDataEeAddr); // ilk yazılım değeri
  
  Glcd_Set_Font(@NewFont5x7, 5, 7, 32);     // Change font
  
  Run_Timers; // timerları çalıştır

  if (FactoryData <> 31) then // ilk yazılım yüklendiğinde bu değer olamaz dolayısıyla buraya girecek
    begin
        EEPROM_Write(EE_DefaultDataEeAddr, 31);
        while (WR_bit) do begin end; // write/erase cycle waiting

        EEPROM_Write(EE_HucreSayisiEeAddr, 55); // hücre sayısı
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        EEPROM_Write(EE_NomHucreGerilimEeAddr, 230); // hücre gerilimi
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        EEPROM_Write(EE_F_ChargePercentLoEeAddr, 90); // Float charge min %
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        EEPROM_Write(EE_F_ChargePercentHiEeAddr, 115); // Float charge max. %
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        EEPROM_Write(EE_B_ChargePercentLoEeAddr, 115); // Boost charge min. %
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        EEPROM_Write(EE_B_ChargePercentHiEeAddr, 135); // Boost charge max. %
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;
        
        RedresorAkim := 60;
        EEPROM_Write(EE_RedresorAkimEeAddr, 60); // Redresör akımı
        while (WR_bit) do begin end;

        FactoryResetBit := 131; // fabrika ayarlarının yüklenmesine izin verildi
        HiddenMenu;

    end;

    if (((Up_Button = 0)and(Ok_Button = 0))or(FactoryResetBit = 131)) then // fabrika ayarlarına dönmek için
      begin
           FactoryData_Write;
           Glcd_Fill(0x00);
      end;

  
//  Glcd_Set_Font(@Digital5x7_4557, 5, 7, 32);     // Change font
  Glcd_Set_Font(@NewFont5x7, 5, 7, 32);     // Change font


  
  if (Hidden_Button =0) then
    begin
        HiddenMenu;
        FactoryData_Write;
    end;
    
  if (Up_Button =0) then
    begin
         while (Up_Button =0) do
          begin
              Glcd_Write_Text('System Test Menu',0,0,Black);
              asm ClrWDT; end;
          end;
         System_TestMenu;
    end;

  Start_Screen;
  
  Data_EepromRead;
  
  Uart_Procedures;
  
  Glcd_Image(@mainscreen);
  Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcVolt_View);
  
  Program_StartBit := 1; // haberleşme için izin verildi
  

  
  while (TRUE) do
   begin
     
     Calibration_Menu;
     
     {
     //************* KALİBRASYON MENUSU GİRİŞ**************************************************************************
     if (Hidden_Button =0) then // ana döngüde gizli menü butonuna basılırsa kalibrasyon menüsü açılır
       begin
           
           Glcd_Fill(0x00);
           
           Buzzer_AllowBit := 1;
           
           Buzzer := 1;
           Pause_Ms(100);
           Buzzer := 0;
           
           Buzzer_AllowBit := 0;
           
           while (Hidden_Button =0) do
             begin
                 asm ClrWDT; end;
                 Glcd_Write_Text('Calibration Menu', 15,4,Black);
             end;
             
           Calibration_Menu;
           
           Glcd_Image(@mainscreen); // menülerden gelince tekrar ana ekranı yükle
           Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcVolt_View);
             
             Turkish_Lang;
             
       end;
     //************* KALİBRASYON MENUSU GİRİŞ**************************************************************************
     
     Check_Modbus;
     
     
     if (Start_Bit = 1) then
       begin
         AlarmYaz;

         Check_Modbus;

         Led_Write(Led1_Group, Led2_Group, Led3_Group);
       end;
     
     Check_Modbus;

     ////////////// Ana bildirim  ///////////////////////////

     Check_Modbus;
     
     LoadVoltageRead;
     
     asm ClrWDT; end;

        if (TimeScreenCounter > 1000) then // 1000ms de bir yap
          begin

            Check_Modbus;
            Read_Time(@hours, @minutes, @seconds, @day, @week, @month, @year);
            asm ClrWDT; end;

            Check_Modbus;
            Show_Time;
            asm ClrWDT; end;
            
            Check_Modbus;
            Temperature_Measurement;
            asm ClrWDT; end;

            Check_Modbus;
            FanAmpsRead;
            asm ClrWDT; end;

            TimeScreenCounter := 0;



            
            
          end;
     ////////////// Ana bildirim  ///////////////////////////


        
        Glcd_Set_Font(@NewFont5x7, 5, 7, 32);     // Change font

        asm ClrWDT; end;

        Check_Modbus;

        Measurement_Screen;  // okunan ve ölçülen dataları ekranda göster
        
        Log_Saved;
        
        Send_RedVolt  := Read_RedVolt;
        Send_LoadVolt := Read_LoadVolt;
        Send_BatAmps  := Read_BattAmps;
        Send_TotalAmps:= Read_TotalAmps;
      
        Check_Modbus;

        Operation_Mode; // çalışma moduna git
      
        Check_Modbus;
        

        
        if (Read_LoadVolt > 100) then // 10,0V' dan küçükse kaçak akımlara bakma
          begin
                AnalogRead(5);
                Adc_Leakage := Adc_Value;
                Adc_Consideration;

                Check_Modbus;
               
                Leakage_Function; // kaçak akımları kontrol et
          end;
          
        Check_Modbus;
        
        TempCompansation_Measurement;

        Check_Modbus;

      //******************* LED TEST*********************
      if (Down_Button =0) then
        begin
            Check_Modbus;
            Led_Test;
            Buzzer_AllowBit := not Buzzer_AllowBit;
        end;

     
      Check_Modbus;
      
      if (Buzzer_AllowBit = 1) then
        begin
            Glcd_PartialImage(24, 0, 12, 7, 12, 7, @vowel_icon);
        end else
      if (Buzzer_AllowBit = 0) then
        begin
            Glcd_PartialImage(24, 0, 12, 7, 12, 7, @silent_icon);
        end;
      
      //******************* LED TEST*********************
      
      if (Modbus_FaultBit = 0) then // haberleşme varsa
        begin
            Glcd_PartialImage(38, 0, 14, 7, 14, 7, @Comm_icon);
        end else
      if (Modbus_FaultBit = 1) then  // haberleşme yoksa
        begin
            Glcd_PartialImage(38, 0, 14, 7, 14, 7, @notcomm_icon2);
        end;
      
              //*************** Ana Ekranda AC Gerilim/Akım Gösterme*************************************************
      if (Up_Button =0) then
        begin
             AcViewScreenBit := not AcViewScreenBit;

             if (AcViewScreenBit = 0) then
               begin
                    Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcVolt_View);
               end else
             if (AcViewScreenBit = 255) then
               begin
                    Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcAmps_View);
               end;

             while (Up_Button =0) do
               begin
                    asm ClrWDT; end;
                    Check_Modbus;
               end;
        
        end;
              //*************** Ana Ekranda AC Gerilim/Akım Gösterme*************************************************
              
        //*************** Menu ************************************************************************************
        if (Ok_Button =0) then
          begin
              while (Ok_Button =0) do
                begin
                    asm ClrWDT; end;
                    Check_Modbus;
                end;
              
              MainMenu;
              
              Glcd_Image(@mainscreen); // menülerden gelince tekrar ana ekranı yükle
              
              if (AcViewScreenBit = 0) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcVolt_View);
                 end else
               if (AcViewScreenBit = 255) then
                 begin
                      Glcd_PartialImage(67, 16, 58, 23, 58, 23, @AcAmps_View);
                 end;
              
              Turkish_Lang;
              
          end; }

        //*************** Menu ************************************************************************************

        asm ClrWDT; end;



  
   end; // main loop while end...
end.
